ontrol box he had found, Rodimus manages to get the doors open. He looks in=
to the room. Stasis pods. The room was full of stasis pods.

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Dark Rodimus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>After several minutes of working with the wires in a control box he had found, Rodimus manages to get the doors open. He looks into the room. Stasis pods. The room was full of stasis pods.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus: I'm in. Looks like a cashe of stasis pods. Probably the pod of every Maximal the fell in one during the Neo Beast Wars. According to the signature the one in the back corner is the one we seek. I've found it!<BR><BR>--- On <B>Sun, 6/22/08, xochitla2006 <I><xochitla2006@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
